entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
